import React, { createContext } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const BASE_URL = "https://localhost:44352/api/Account"; export default function LoginApi() { const handleSubmit =(event) => { event.preventDefault(); const data = { email: event.target.email.value, password: event.target.password.value, remember_me: event.target.remember_me.value } axios.post(`${BASE_URL}/Login`,data) .then(response => { if (response.status === "200") window.location.href = "/fuel-wise"; }) .catch(err => console.log(err.response)) } return (
